scripts.build-all: npm run build-backend && npm run build-docs
scripts.build-backend: sh -c 'find ../backend -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 4 -type f -name "package.json" -not -path "*/node_modules/*" -not -path "*/extension/*" -exec echo "ğŸš§ Building {}" \; -execdir npm run build \;'
scripts.deploy: npm run build-all && echo 'ğŸš€ Deploying backend' && npm run cdk -- deploy --all --require-approval=never --profile task-genie-stage --context envName=stage
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build-all && echo 'ğŸš€ Deploying backend' && npm run cdk -- deploy --all --require-approval=never --profile task-genie-prod --context envName=prod
scripts.install-all: sh -c 'find ../backend -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 4 -type f -name "package.json" -not -path "*/node_modules/*" -exec echo "ğŸ› ï¸ Installing {}" \; -execdir npm install \; && echo "ğŸ› ï¸ Installing ../docs/package.json" && npm install --prefix ../docs'
